46D0EF398FDB46B28390BA8E5112E981.description:
Identify an audience and adapt the health or safety message and communication
technique to the characteristics of the individual or group.

CAAD289FA8AB4DE2A2DDEF4458C3A66A.description:
Use communication techniques to persuade the individual or group to support or
act on the health or safety issue.

19B3D39FCE464A1494450A2EB84A7B34.description: Demonstrate personal beliefs regarding the health or safety issue.

31CC64CA78824CE8B094CD08C8DC9F24.description: Identify agencies, organizations, or others who advocate for the health issue.

FDC74FF1106947749BAA4C52CC24A908.description: Research the health or safety issue

F2375C2405A349B9AC38B79C386B7CC5.description:
Conduct a personal, family, or community health or safety assessment and/or
review data from an existing health assessment.

29987C960272465DB8EA532A1D19D241.description:
Students will demonstrate the ability to advocate for personal, family and community
health.

8E10CB1C92E748B3B84B37E7048E7B0C.description:

safety strengths and needs.

health and reduce health risks.

CE365A777E254796B5FBBBCFC1BD6806.description:

185A7150C6264697B550DBA93442D0E8.description: Students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.

0BAC1C776A6C430786BE670E6F6223E1.description: Assume responsibility for personal health decisions.

C14A3AF4C3F644CD83E72892D29AC05C.description: Describe how personal health decisions may affect subsequent decisions.

67A79B730E6C4C50A7C4EC54ECDA4169.description: Implement healthy strategies to prevent and manage conflict.

3B7EE6231D70421F9E64A74C3C381982.description: Demonstrate how to ask for assistance to enhance the health of self and others.

CAE7ED91EDCB427EA572A7931ADFC6B6.description: Demonstrate the ability to refuse or negotiate health risks in healthy ways.

CF254DA971724ECCB9D0AF5982910E5B.description: Demonstrate active listening and response skills to enhance health.
